I am a visionary person from the very small village of Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India. I was a brilliant student throughout my school years, then I began my career by studying chartered accountancy (C.A.) in Surat, but soon I realized that I was more interested in the tourism sector...

I am the rst solo traveler from Gujarat who traveled all over India by walking and hitchhiking for 182 days. For this incredible journey of mine, I was featured on so many TV channels, magazines, and social media platforms.
My passion for travel and eco-tourism led me to study in Europe, and in 2025 I was invited to Greece for an international youth festival to inspire students and youth.
It’s 12,000 Kilometres walking journey from Malta(Europe) to India across 20 countries for Spreading Awareness about climate change and sustainable living.

Climate change is not a future threat, it is a silent goodbye we are already saying to our rivers, forests, and children so This mission is my promise to the planet: I will not stay silent while our only home is burning.
From certifications to creating organizations, each achievement represents a step towards inspiring and empowering others through adventure and nature conservation.
I pursued a diploma in hospitality, tour, and travel management from a wellknown institute in Surat, Gujarat, India.

The ‘Go Alive’ organization selected me for the youth festival in Greece to inspire Greek students and youth along with 25 other team members. They organized youth festivals in different parts of Greece and inspired thousands of people for non-formal learning.

I am the first solo traveler from Gujarat who traveled all over India by walking and hitchhiking for 182 days. For this incredible journey of mine, I was featured on so many TV channels, magazines, and social media platforms.

I am a certifed trekking instructor and worked with India’s largest trekking organization, “Invincible NGO. ” Thousands of participants completed their dream treks under my guidance in different parts of India.

In 2022, I became a certied kayaking instructor. I passed India’s toughest institute for watersports “NIWS”s (National Institute of Watersports) exam and for that, I was honored with a license and certicate of kayaking.
In 2023, I successfully completed basic and advanced courses in power paragliding from a well-renowned institute called “NIMAS” and became a certied power paraglider
The Climate Walker | Walking Across the World for a Greener Future
Follow the Climate Walker on a 12,000 km journey from Malta to India, inspiring climate awareness, sustainability, and unity across 20 nations.
Walking across 20 countries for us and the Earth
Join the epic 12,000 km journey from Malta to India - one step at a time, spreading climate awareness across 20 countries and countless communities.

I’m covering long distances every day—on foot—through heat, rain, and terrain. I am walking thousands of kilometers—from Malta to India—not for leisure, not for fame, but for something far bigger than myself.
Tools to share the stories I gather
Ability to reach more people with this urgent message
Communication: sim cards, internet, power banks, filming tools
Awareness materials: posters, flyers, translation, event setups
Safety & visas: border permits, emergency help, insurance
Hear from the amazing people who have been inspired by the journey and have helped make every step possible through their kindness and support.
Supporting this journey reminded me that even small steps can change the world. Watching him walk across countries for a cause is truly inspiring.
His dedication to walk across continents for awareness is beyond admirable. It shows what passion and purpose can achieve when combined with courage.
I’ve followed his journey since the early days. The stories, the people he meets, and the purpose behind every mile walked—it’s truly a movement of hope.
Stay updated with daily progress, stunning photos, and inspiring stories from the road.
